function.name: search_web
function.description: Web search. Search the web and return ranked results. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range 1–20. (default: 10)

search_depth.description: Search depth. "advanced" uses more sources and costs more upstream compute. (default: "basic")

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to bias results.

time_range.description: Restrict results to the given time range.

include_answer.description: If true, the response includes an AI-generated answer summarizing the results. (default: false)

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only.

function.name: search_news
function.description: News search. Search for recent news articles. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range 1–20. (default: 10)

search_depth.description: Search depth. "advanced" uses more sources and costs more upstream compute. (default: "basic")

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to bias results.

time_range.description: Restrict results to the given time range.

include_answer.description: If true, the response includes an AI-generated answer summarizing the results. (default: false)

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only.

function.name: search_extract
function.description: Extract URL content. Extract readable content from one or more URLs. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

urls.description: URL or array of URLs to extract content from.
